entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 40%

Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
